thread.title: Netanyahu Sets Off Storm of Criticism Over Holocaust Remarks

author: Rory Jones
title: Netanyahu Sets Off Storm of Criticism Over Holocaust Remarks
text:
JERUSALEMâ€”Palestinian and Israeli officials condemned Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Wednesday for claiming a Palestinian persuaded Adolf Hitler to undertake the extermination of European Jewry in World War II.
Mr. Netanyahu revived the long-standing allegation of Arab authorship of the Holocaust in a speech Tuesday to the World... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
